A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really\, really enjoyed this on the first watching. Looking forward to a second viewing to catch things I might have missed. Yes\, I'm a big Star Wars fan\, but this movie was NOT fan service as much as The Force Awakens was - instead\, this one stands on it's own. No\, it's not perfect. But 56% audience score is bizarre... Maybe some people out there hold Star Wars to an almost unattainable standard?
